segments.text: Good morning . Venus Real Estate Agency .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I'm calling to ask if you have a vacant apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any particular type of apartment in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you renting it alone or with company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll share it with one of my friends . What ’ s in a one-bedroom apartment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A one-bedroom apartment has one bedroom , a living room , a kitchen and a bathroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but a fridge and a stove .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds wonderful . Do I have to sign a lease ? How much should I pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s a one-year lease . And $ 200 a week with one month refundable deposit .
segments.speaker: S1
